title: #22: Real Stories from our Listeners
description:
Jim Clemente (retired FBI profiler and Criminal Minds writer/producer) and Laura Richards (former New Scotland Yard Criminal Behavioral Analyst and foundfer of Paladin Stalking Victim's Advocacy Service) read real life cases of stalking and abuse from the listeners of the podcast. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
